Whenever the Zoning Administrator shall issue a decision granting a variance pursuant to Charter Section 
4.105 and the Planning Code, the Zoning Administrator shall immediately transmit a copy of such decision to the Assessor. 
(Added by Ord. 113-75, App. 4/4/75; amended by Ord. 254-00, File No. 001548, App. 10/27/2000)
